headline: PSEG Sustainability Progress And New Director Appointment Under Investor Spotlight
summary: Public Service Enterprise Group (NYSE:PEG) reports recycling of over 86% of its generated materials in 2024 as part of its sustainability efforts. The company highlights its ongoing recognition for sustainability practices across its operations. PSEG appoints industry leader Geisha J. Williams to its Board of Directors, expanding board experience and oversight. For investors looking at utilities, NYSE:PEG sits at the intersection of regulated energy delivery and growing expectations around...
